Project @youwol/math - v0.0.2

math

Mathematical library for YouWol

Description

Provide some simple and basic functions and classes

Use

To install the required dependencies:

yarn

To build for development:

yarn build:dev

To build for production:

yarn build:prod

To test:

yarn test
